snippet.title: Were.Wolf Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A dark and mysterious puzzle platformer where you switch forms to survive.

Get the game: https://yrgo-game-creator.itch.io/werewolf

Were.Wolf is a stealthy puzzle platformer where you play as a young man who is turned into a werewolf. Follow him through a dark and mysterious castle as he tries to reach the potion to lift the curse and escape.

Edited by: Jonatan Johansson
Music by: Robert Lundberg (https://soundcloud.com/dukeswe)
